careerBackground: In June 2013 I graduated from King’s College London in Computer Science. My experience ranges from building a mobile soccer game, to optimising train utilisation in India, to winning sales bids, and designing engaging digital products.
role: As an Associate Product Analyst I turn inspiration into innovation. I create, challenge and inspire the future digital landscape. I specialise in delivering simplicity, engagement and effective messages through creativity and imagination.
superHeroPower: Super Free Running – I love exploring new places so I want to be able to climb to high vantage points to see the world from above!
